item.title: Kelita add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas I'll never know." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "God is a circle whose center is everywhere and circumference nowhere." -- Voltaire

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Carl Hiaasen
item.description: "Garcia wondered why people with JESUS stickers on their bumper always drove twenty miles per hour under the speed limit. If God was my co-pilot, he thought, I'd be doing a hundred and twenty." -- Carl Hiaasen

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "And if these mountains had eyes, they would wake to find two strangers in their fences, standing in admiration as a breathing red pours its tinge upon earth's shore. These mountains, which have seen untold sunrises, long to thunder praise but stand reverent, silent so that man's weak praise should be given God's attention." -- Donald Miller

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]
item.description: "It's sometimes funny to watch some people doing something the wrong way but doing it confidently. Even more funny, they succeeded." -- Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

item.title: Kelita add a quote by Karen Jensen
item.description: "You can count the seeds in an apple, but you can't count the apples in a seed. When you teach, you never know how many lives you will influence...you are teaching for eternity" -- Karen Jensen
